actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: To amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to modify the applicability of the pre-clearance procedures.

summary.text: Amends the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to require the Attorney General, whenever the Director of the Census determines that less than 50 percent of the persons of voting age are registered in a State or political subdivision or that less than 50 percent of such persons voted in the Presidential election of November 8, 1988, to administer a pre-clearance voting procedure different from that in effect on September 24, 1991.

titles.title: To amend the Voting Rights Act of 1965 to modify the applicability of the pre-clearance procedures.
